title: Riot declares ally bots in PvE not their problem to correct
body:
My post to the Report A Bug sub-board
> The ally bots, which have appeared in the past few weeks in almost every PvE game, often disconnect, quit, or never get out of base.

Their reply
> We've noticed your post is not in the correct sub-board. We feel like General Discussion is a better sub-board for this particular topic.

From this response, I conclude that Riot does not see the ally bots as something they consider part of their stable.
